00002 // dxf_codes.h
00004 
00015 // Embeds version info in the executable, but does not load at run time.
00016 #pragma comment(exestr, "$Id: dl_codes.h,v 1.2 2002/03/01 17:31:44 andrew23 Exp $")
00017 
00022 #if !defined(DXF_CODES_H)
00023 #define DXF_CODES_H
00024 
00025 #if _MSC_VER > 1000
00026 #pragma once
00027 #endif // _MSC_VER > 1000
00028 
00029 class dxfConst
00030 {
00031 public:
00032         enum color
00033         {
00034                 black = 255, // Is this right? I just guessed.
00035                 green = 3,
00036                 red = 1,
00037                 brown = 15,
00038                 yellow = 2,
00039                 cyan = 4,
00040                 magenta = 6,
00041                 gray = 8,
00042                 blue = 5,
00043                 l_blue = 163,
00044                 l_green = 121,
00045                 l_cyan = 131,
00046                 l_red = 23,
00047                 l_magenta = 221,
00048                 l_gray = 252,
00049                 white = 7,
00050                 bylayer = 256,
00051                 byblock = 0
00052         };
00053 };
00054 
00055 /*************** DXF COLOR CONSTANTS ******************/
00056 // Only the constants used by CK are defined so far
00057 // Would be better if actual palettes could be compared,
00058 // i.e., map one to another based on RGB content.
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062 /*************** DXF VERSIONS ******************/
00063 #define VER_R12    "AC1009"
00064 #define VER_LT2    "AC1009"
00065 #define VER_R13    "AC1012"
00066 #define VER_LT95   "AC1012"
00067 #define VER_R14    "AC1014"
00068 #define VER_LT97   "AC1014"
00069 #define VER_LT98   "AC1014"
00070 #define VER_2000   "AC1015"
00071 #define VER_2002   "AC1015"
00072 
00073 
00074 /*************** DXF GROUP CODES ******************/
00075 
00076 // Strings
00077 #define STRGRP_START      0
00078 #define STRGRP_END        9
00079 
00080 // Coordinates
00081 #define CRDGRP_START     10
00082 #define CRDGRP_END       19
00083 
00084 // Real values
00085 #define RLGRP_START      38
00086 #define RLGRP_END        59
00087 
00088 // Short integer values
00089 #define SHOGRP_START     60
00090 #define SHOGRP_END       79
00091 
00092 // New in Release 13,
00093 #define SUBCLASS        100
00094 
00095 // More coordinates
00096 #define CRD2GRP_START   210
00097 #define CRD2GRP_END     239
00098 
00099 // Extended data strings
00100 #define ESTRGRP_START  1000
00101 #define ESTRGRP_END    1009
00102 
00103 // Extended data reals
00104 #define ERLGRP_START   1010
00105 #define ERLGRP_END     1059
00106 
00107 
00108 #define Y8_COORD_CODE       28
00109 #define Z0_COORD_CODE       30
00110 #define Z8_COORD_CODE       38
00111 
00112 #define POINT_COORD_CODE    10
00113 #define INSERT_COORD_CODE   10
00114 
00115 #define CRD2GRP_START      210
00116 #define CRD2GRP_END        239
00117 
00118 #define THICKNESS            39
00119 #define FIRST_REAL_CODE      THICKNESS
00120 #define LAST_REAL_CODE       59
00121 #define FIRST_INT_CODE       60
00122 #define ATTFLAGS_CODE        70
00123 #define PLINE_FLAGS_CODE     70
00124 #define LAYER_FLAGS_CODE     70
00125 #define FLD_LEN_CODE         73 // Inside ATTRIB resbuf
00126 #define LAST_INT_CODE        79
00127 #define X_EXTRU_CODE        210
00128 #define Y_EXTRU_CODE        220
00129 #define Z_EXTRU_CODE        230
00130 #define COMMENT_CODE        999
00131 
00132 // Start and endpoints of a line
00133 #define LINE_START_CODE      10  // Followed by x coord
00134 #define LINE_END_CODE        11  // Followed by x coord
00135 
00136 // Some codes used by blocks
00137 #define BLOCK_FLAGS_CODE     70  // An int containing flags
00138 #define BLOCK_BASE_CODE      10  // Origin of block definition
00139 #define XREF_DEPENDENT       16  // If a block contains an XREF
00140 #define XREF_RESOLVED        32  // If a XREF resolved ok
00141 #define REFERENCED           64  // If a block is ref'd in DWG
00142 
00143 #define XSCALE_CODE          41
00144 #define YSCALE_CODE          42
00145 #define ANGLE_CODE           50
00146 #define INS_POINT_CODE       10  // Followed by x of ins pnt
00147 #define NAME2_CODE            3  // Second appearance of name 
00148 
00149 // Some codes used by circle entities
00150 #define CENTER_CODE          10  // Followed by x of center
00151 #define RADIUS_CODE          40  // Followd by radius of circle
00152 
00153 #define COND_OP_CODE         -4  // Conditional op,ads_ssget
00154 
00155 // When using ads_buildlist you MUST use RTDXF0 instead of these
00156 #define ENTITY_TYPE_CODE      0  // Then there is LINE, 3DFACE..
00157 #define SES_CODE              0  // Start End String Code
00158 #define FILE_SEP_CODE         0  // File separator
00159 #define SOT_CODE              0  // Start Of Table
00160 #define TEXTVAL_CODE          1
00161 #define NAME_CODE             2
00162 #define BLOCK_NAME_CODE       2
00163 #define SECTION_NAME_CODE     2
00164 #define ENT_HAND_CODE         5  // What follows is hexa string
00165 #define TXT_STYLE_CODE        7  // Inside attributes
00166 #define LAYER_NAME_CODE       8  // What follows is layer name
00167 #define FIRST_XCOORD_CODE    10  // Group code x of 1st coord
00168 #define FIRST_YCOORD_CODE    20  // Group code y of 1st coord
00169 #define FIRST_ZCOORD_CODE    30  // Group code z of 1st coord
00170 #define L_START_CODE         10
00171 #define L_END_CODE           11
00172 #define TXTHI_CODE           40
00173 #define SCALE_X_CODE         41
00174 #define SCALE_Y_CODE         42
00175 #define SCALE_Z_CODE         43
00176 #define BULGE_CODE           42  // Used in PLINE verts for arcs
00177 #define ROTATION_CODE        50
00178 #define COLOUR_CODE          62  // What follows is a color int
00179 #define LTYPE_CODE            6  // What follows is a linetype
00180 
00181 
00182 // Attribute flags
00183 #define ATTS_FOLLOW_CODE     66
00184 #define ATT_TAG_CODE          2
00185 #define ATT_VAL_CODE          1
00186 #define ATT_FLAGS_CODE       70  // 4 1 bit flags as follows...
00187 #define ATT_INVIS_FLAG        1
00188 #define ATT_CONST_FLAG        2
00189 #define ATT_VERIFY_FLAG       4 // Prompt and verify
00190 #define ATT_PRESET_FLAG       8 // No prompt and no verify
00191 
00192 // PLINE defines
00193 // Flags
00194 #define OPEN_PLINE       0x00
00195 #define CLOSED_PLINE     0x01
00196 #define POLYLINE3D       0x80
00197 #define PFACE_MESH       0x40
00198 #define PGON_MESH        0x10
00199 // Vertices follow entity, required in POLYLINES
00200 #define VERTS_FOLLOW_CODE   66 // Value should always be 1
00201 #define VERTEX_COORD_CODE   10
00202 
00203 
00204 // LAYER flags
00205 #define FROZEN           1
00206 #define FROZEN_BY_DEF    2
00207 #define LOCKED           4
00208 #define OBJECT_USED     64   // Object is ref'd in the dwg
00209 
00210 #define BLOCK_EN_CODE   -2   // Block entity definition 
00211 #define E_NAME          -1   // Entity name 
00212 
00213 // Extended data codes 
00214 #define EXTD_SENTINEL    (-3)
00215 #define EXTD_STR         1000
00216 #define EXTD_APP_NAME    1001
00217 #define EXTD_CTL_STR     1002
00218 #define EXTD_LYR_STR     1003
00219 #define EXTD_CHUNK       1004
00220 #define EXTD_HANDLE      1005
00221 #define EXTD_POINT       1010
00222 #define EXTD_POS         1011
00223 #define EXTD_DISP        1012
00224 #define EXTD_DIR         1013
00225 #define EXTD_FLOAT       1040
00226 #define EXTD_DIST        1041
00227 #define EXTD_SCALE       1042
00228 #define EXTD_INT16       1070
00229 #define EXTD_INT32       1071
00230 
00231 // UCS codes for use in ads_trans
00232 #define WCS_TRANS_CODE      0
00233 #define UCS_TRANS_CODE      1
00234 #define DCS_TRANS_CODE      2
00235 #define PCS_TRANS_CODE      3
